events.title: Hacktoberfest 2025 â€” Open Source Contribution Marathon
events.description: Celebrate Hacktoberfest by contributing to open source! Beginners and experienced devs alike are welcome. Learn to make your first pull request, collaborate on real-world projects, and earn digital badges & swag. Guided by mentors every step of the way.

events.title: Women in Tech Panel & Networking Night
events.description: Inspiring panel with female engineers from Google, Microsoft, and startups. Networking dinner and mentorship matching.
